genius.core.boaframework

Class BOA

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.boaframework.BOA
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptanceStrategy, OfferingStrategy, OMStrategy, OpponentModel

    public abstract class BOA
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract superclass for BOA components. This should have been called BOAcomponent but that class is already in use. Usually instances are created using BoaRepItem.getInstance() and then calling {#init(NegotiationSession)}

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BOA() 

    • Method Summary

      Method called at the end of the negotiation.

      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getParameters() 
      java.util.Set<BOAparameter> getParameterSpec() 
      abstract java.io.Serializable loadData()
      Method used to load the saved object, possibly created in a previous negotiation session.
      abstract void storeData(java.io.Serializable object)
      Method used to store data that should be accessible in the next negotiation session on the same scenario.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • BOA

        public BOA()

    • Method Detail

      • getParameters

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getParameters()
        Returns:
        * The actual parameters that are used by this instance, as set by call to init(NegotiationSession, Map).

      • getParameterSpec

        public java.util.Set<BOAparameter> getParameterSpec()
        Returns:
        the parameter specifications of this BOA component. Default implementation returns empty set. If a BOA component has parameters, it should override this. This can be different from the actual parameters used at runtime, which is passed through #init(NegotiationSession) calls to the components.

      • endSession

        public void endSession(NegotiationResult result)
        Method called at the end of the negotiation. Ideal location to call the storeData method to receiveMessage the data to be saved.
        Parameters:
        result - of the negotiation.

      • storeData

        public abstract void storeData(java.io.Serializable object)
        Method used to store data that should be accessible in the next negotiation session on the same scenario. This method can be called during the negotiation, but it makes more sense to call it in the endSession method.
        Parameters:
        object - to be saved by this component.

      • loadData

        public abstract java.io.Serializable loadData()
        Method used to load the saved object, possibly created in a previous negotiation session. The method returns null when such an object does not exist yet.
        Returns:
        saved object or null when not available.

      • getName

        public abstract java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        a short name for this component.
